translation.en: [woman 1] Robert Johnson is considered one of the greatest blues artists of all time.
translation.zh: 罗伯特约翰逊被称为史上最伟大的布鲁斯艺术家之一

translation.en: [man 1] There's just something sort of supernatural about Robert.
translation.zh: 罗伯特具有某种非人的高超天赋

translation.en: [woman 2] This is a level of genius that maybe will only exist once.
translation.zh: 这种程度的天才可能只会出现一次

translation.en: [man 2] You can't hear a blues tune or a rock tune that
translation.zh: 你不会听到没有罗伯特和弦的

translation.en: don't have some of Robert's chords in it.
translation.zh: 布鲁斯调或摇滚曲

translation.en: [man 3] You think you're hearing two or three guys playing
translation.zh: 你以为自己听到的是两个或三个人的演奏

translation.en: and it's just one guy.
translation.zh: 其实只是一个人

translation.en: [Robert] ♪ I went to the crossroads ♪
translation.zh: 我来到十字路口

translation.en: ♪ Fell down on my knees ♪
translation.zh: 双膝跪地

translation.en: [man 4] It's the template for what became rock and roll.
translation.zh: 这是后来演变成摇滚乐的模板

translation.en: The songs and the subject matter, let alone the guitar playing,
translation.zh: 这些歌和主题用吉他演奏的时候

translation.en: which is very much like Bach,
translation.zh: 听起来非常像巴赫

translation.en: and the voice is so eerie...
translation.zh: 声音非常诡异

translation.en: ♪ Save poor Bob if you please ♪
translation.zh: 如果可以 请拯救可怜的鲍勃

translation.en: [man 1] You put that in a class by itself, you know, and Johnson is.
translation.zh: 这是别具一格的音乐 约翰逊就是独一无二的

translation.en: ♪ Standin' at the crossroads ♪
translation.zh: 站在十字路口

translation.en: [man 5] Because there wasn't that much known about Johnson,
translation.zh: 因为关于约翰逊的信息太少了

translation.en: he came with mystery attached.
translation.zh: 他变成了一种神秘的存在

translation.en: [man 6] The myth of Robert Johnson still lives today,
translation.zh: 关于罗伯特约翰逊的传说至今存在

translation.en: because there was so many unsolved mysteries.
translation.zh: 因为有太多谜团有待解开

translation.en: [man 7] The music drew us in,
translation.zh: 首先吸引我们的是音乐

translation.en: but it was the myth that made people believe that there is magic out there.
translation.zh: 但传说让人们相信 这里面存在魔法

translation.en: [man 8] All of us have been trying to figure out the mystery around the man.
translation.zh: 我们所有人都尝试解读围绕在这个男人周围的秘密

translation.en: [man 4] Robert was said to have been a novice guitar player.
translation.zh: 有传闻说 罗伯特本来是一个入门级吉他演奏者

translation.en: Not very good.
translation.zh: 弹得不太好

translation.en: [man 9] So he went away and came back playing so good,
translation.zh: 他远走他乡 回乡后演奏极其出色

translation.en: that everybody says, "He did something."
translation.zh: 所有人都说：“他做了什么”

translation.en: [man 4] The legend is he went to the crossroads,
translation.zh: 传说他去了十字路口

translation.en: he met the devil there,
translation.zh: 在那里遇到了魔鬼

translation.en: he sold his soul,
translation.zh: 他出卖了自己的灵魂

translation.en: and then he became the greatest guitar player in the world.
translation.zh: 之后成为了世界上最棒的吉他演奏家

translation.en: [man 6] But how much is myth
translation.zh: 但是其中有多少传说

translation.en: and how much is real?
translation.zh: 又有多少真实呢？

translation.en: [man 6] There's very little known about the life of Robert Johnson.
translation.zh: 关于罗伯特约翰逊生平的信息非常少

translation.en: In fact, there are only two known photos.
translation.zh: 事实上 只有两张已知的照片

translation.en: And no footage.
translation.zh: 且没有视频资料

translation.en: [man] I've spent the last 50 years...
translation.zh: 在过去的50年…

translation.en: studying the life and music of Robert Johnson.
translation.zh: 我一直在研究罗伯特约翰逊的人生和音乐

translation.en: [man 4] Robert Johnson had a very short recording career.
translation.zh: （圣安东尼奥唱片） 罗伯特约翰逊的唱片生涯十分短暂

translation.en: We only have 29 compositions.
translation.zh: 我们只有29首歌

translation.en: [man] And he died so young, at the age of 27.
translation.zh: 他很年轻就离开了人世 只有27岁

translation.en: I first found out that Robert Johnson was my grandfather
translation.zh: 我第一次知道罗伯特约翰逊是我的祖父的时候

translation.en: when I was about 15 years old.
translation.zh: 我大概15岁

translation.en: [man] When I first heard Robert Johnson, I was like,
translation.zh: 当我第一次听说罗伯特约翰逊时 我心想：“好吧 这才是音乐”

translation.en: "Okay, that's what music is."
translation.zh: 我心想：“好吧 这才是音乐”

translation.en: And there's so much we don't know about him,
translation.zh: 关于他 我们有太多的不了解

translation.en: so I read everything I could get my hands on.
translation.zh: 所以我阅读了所有能读到的资料

translation.en: [man] I became a scholar of Johnson by reading everything I possibly could,
translation.zh: 我成为了一名约翰逊学者我读了所有我能找到的资料

translation.en: by listening to all his music,
translation.zh: 听了他所有的音乐

translation.en: but also as a musician,
translation.zh: 同时 作为一个音乐人

translation.en: I was trying to get inside and understand what his state of mind was.
translation.zh: 我试着在音乐中了解他的思想

translation.en: [woman] When I heard Robert Johnson,
translation.zh: 当我听到罗伯特约翰逊的音乐时

translation.en: I said, "This is the top of the tower,
translation.zh: 我说：“这是塔的顶端”

translation.en: and I gotta figure out what that is."
translation.zh: 我一定要知道那是什么

translation.en: But it wasn't a conscious decision,
translation.zh: 但这不是一个有意的决定

translation.en: it was just like, that's what I knew I wanted to do.
translation.zh: 我只知道我想这么做

translation.en: I remember my grandfather saying,
translation.zh: 我记得我祖父说：

translation.en: "That old boy from the Delta, Robert Johnson,
translation.zh: “那个来自三角洲的男孩罗伯特约翰逊

translation.en: always hung out at the graveyard."
translation.zh: 总是在墓地游荡”

translation.en: -[playing blues] -And then he started talking about,
translation.zh: 然后他开始说：

translation.en: "Him the devil, done this and done that."
translation.zh: “他是魔鬼 做了这些 做了那些”

translation.en: And it just brung a lot of curiousness about this man.
translation.zh: 这就让我对那个男人更加好奇

translation.en: There was one cut by Robert Johnson on this country blues record
translation.zh: 在罗伯特约翰逊的一张乡村布鲁斯唱片中 有一首歌

translation.en: and it just stood out.
translation.zh: 非常突出

translation.en: So I made it a quest to find out as much as I could about him.
translation.zh: 所以我决心尽我所能找到关于他的一切资料

translation.en: [Bruce] I made countless trips to his hometown, Hazlehurst, Mississippi,
translation.zh: 我无数次造访他的家乡密西西比州黑泽尔赫斯特

translation.en: talking to everyone that I could find who knew him.
translation.zh: 和每一个我能找到的认识他的人交谈

translation.en: I would just drive until I saw
translation.zh: 我会一直开车直到我看到

translation.en: somebody sitting on their porch outside and I'd just pull up.
translation.zh: 有人坐在房屋外面 然后停车

translation.en: And there'd just be so much information that you could get
translation.zh: 仅仅通过这样突然的登门拜访

translation.en: just by cold calling people, you know?
translation.zh: 就能得到很多信息

translation.en: Did you and Robert go together for a while?
translation.zh: 你曾经和罗伯特约会吗？

translation.en: I guess about six or seven months, something like that.
translation.zh: 大概有六七个月吧

translation.en: Before he left and went somewhere to make records.
translation.zh: 然后他就去什么地方录唱片去了

translation.en: He said he's going to make... make some records.
translation.zh: 他说他要去做唱片

translation.en: [Bruce] It wasn't until 1967...
translation.zh: 直到1967年

translation.en: that Robert's death certificate was discovered.
translation.zh: （死亡证明） 罗伯特的死亡证明才被发现

translation.en: And with that discovery, we learned who his mother was,
translation.zh: 从死亡证明中我们才知道他的母亲是谁

translation.en: we learned who is father was,
translation.zh: 他的父亲是谁

translation.en: and we learned the first real facts about Robert Johnson.
translation.zh: 我们知道了第一个关于罗伯特约翰逊的真正事实

translation.en: So, little by little,
translation.zh: 所以一点一点地 通过人口调查记录城市记录…

translation.en: using census records, city directories,
translation.zh: 所以一点一点地 通过人口调查记录城市记录… （美国第14次人口普查）

translation.en: death certificates, marriage licenses...
translation.zh: …死亡证明结婚证…

translation.en: More and more information came out,
translation.zh: 越来越多的信息出现了

translation.en: and each time a piece of information would come out,
translation.zh: 每次出现新信息的时候

translation.en: it would be like a new key that would open up yet another door.
translation.zh: 就像一把打开新世界大门的钥匙

translation.en: [man] They said you were wearin' some orange.
translation.zh: 他们说你穿着偏橘黄色的衣服

translation.en: [Bruce] Hey, Steve...
translation.zh: 嗨 史蒂文

translation.en: ♪ Down at the crossroads ♪
translation.zh: 走在十字路口

translation.en: ♪ Dark gon' catch me here ♪
translation.zh: 黑暗会找到我

translation.en: My grandfather, Robert Johnson, was born in Hazlehurst, Mississippi.
translation.zh: 我的祖父 罗伯特约翰逊出生在密西西比州黑泽尔赫斯特

translation.en: His mother was Julia Dodds
translation.zh: 他的母亲是朱莉娅多德斯

translation.en: and she was married to Charles Dodds.
translation.zh: 她嫁给了查尔斯多德斯

translation.en: [Bruce] Charles Dodds was a wealthy carpenter and farmer.
translation.zh: 查尔斯多德斯是一个富裕的木匠和农民

translation.en: But some local white people resented his success
translation.zh: 但当地的一些白人对他的成就感到不满

translation.en: and he was forced to flee to Memphis to escape a lynch mob.
translation.zh: 他被迫逃到孟菲斯躲避欲将其私刑处死的暴徒

translation.en: Julia was left destitute
translation.zh: 茱莉亚被抛下 陷入了贫困

translation.en: and took up with a local lumber camp worker,
translation.zh: 之后和木材厂的工人结合

translation.en: who would become Robert's biological father.
translation.zh: 这个人就是罗伯特的生父

translation.en: [Bruce] This was the home...
translation.zh: 这个房子…

translation.en: in all probability,
translation.zh: 很有可能

translation.en: where Robert Johnson was actually born.
translation.zh: 是罗伯特约翰逊出生的地方

translation.en: Here it is,
translation.zh: 就是这里

translation.en: this beyond-modest place... [chuckles]
translation.zh: 这个特别一般的地方

translation.en: ...that somehow has persisted
translation.zh: 居然已经存在

translation.en: for more than a century.
translation.zh: 超过一个世纪了

translation.en: The fact that it survives...
translation.zh: 它仍然屹立不倒的事实…

translation.en: it's kind of like a metaphor for Robert's life.
translation.zh: 就像是对罗伯特人生的一种隐喻

translation.en: [Steven] As far as my information goes,
translation.zh: 根据我现有的信息

translation.en: he was always pushed from one house to another house,
translation.zh: 他总是被迫从一个地方到另一个地方

translation.en: from Memphis to the Delta to Arkansas,
translation.zh: 从孟菲斯到三角洲到阿肯色

translation.en: and I think his mom even walked out on him at one point.
translation.zh: 我认为有段时间他妈妈甚至曾抛下他们不管

translation.en: So he never had a stable home and a stable environment.
translation.zh: 所以他从来没有一个稳定的家和一个稳定的环境

translation.en: He never had a father figure that accepted him for who he was.
translation.zh: 从来没有人以父亲的身份接受他

translation.en: Years went by,
translation.zh: 很多年过去了

translation.en: until eventually Robert Johnson's mother remarried.
translation.zh: 罗伯特约翰逊的母亲再婚后

translation.en: Robert moved in with his new stepfather, a sharecropper.
translation.zh: 罗伯特搬去与他身为佃农的继父同住

translation.en: I heard his stepfather used to abuse him.
translation.zh: 我听说他的继父会虐待他

translation.en: Because he didn't want to go work in the fields, he would beat him.
translation.zh: 因为他不想到田里工作他继父就打他

translation.en: [Adam] Johnson looked at his stepfather, who was a sharecropper,
translation.zh: 约翰逊看着他身为佃农的继父

translation.en: and saw what a bad deal it was
translation.zh: 目睹了被犁和农场头牵制的人生

translation.en: to get hooked up to a plow and a boss,
translation.zh: 有多么不公平

translation.en: and said, "I'm gonna be free. I'm not gonna do that.
translation.zh: 他说：“我要自由 我不想做这个

translation.en: I'm not gonna get ripped off that way."
translation.zh: 我不想被这样占便宜”

translation.en: [Steven] But as a race, we didn't have much to choose from as far as work goes.
translation.zh: 但作为黑人 就工作而言我们没有多少选择

translation.en: It was the field
translation.zh: 要么下地工作

translation.en: or basically nothing.
translation.zh: 要么什么都没有

translation.en: So, he wanted to make his living with the blues.
translation.zh: 所以他想通过布鲁斯为生

translation.en: Long fingers, playing the guitar, he didn't want to mess his fingers up.
translation.zh: 长手指 弹吉他他不想弄坏自己的手指

translation.en: [Terry] He'd come to the field and play for somebody
translation.zh: 他来到田里 为别人演奏

translation.en: to make a nickel or dime, you know.
translation.zh: 挣5分 10分钱

translation.en: [man] The big deal was Will Dockery's plantation.
translation.zh: 不得不提到威利多可利种植园

translation.en: Outside of Robinsonville.
translation.zh: （多可利农场） 在鲁滨逊维尔外面

translation.en: People worked there all week long.
translation.zh: 人们在那工作一整周

translation.en: No radios,
translation.zh: 没有电台 （泰马哈 音乐人）

translation.en: no music, no entertainment.
translation.zh: 没有音乐和娱乐活动

translation.en: But, on the weekend, the musicians came out.
translation.zh: 但到了周末 音乐家会出现

translation.en: It served as a balm for people who were in bondage.
translation.zh: 对于被束缚的人来说音乐就是一种慰藉

translation.en: And it gave you a way out.
translation.zh: 给你一种抒发感情的通道

translation.en: You play that music, you could be outside of yourself.
translation.zh: 演奏音乐时 你能忘却自我

translation.en: You know, you could take everybody else out.
translation.zh: 你能帮别人脱离束缚

translation.en: You know, outside of their selves.
translation.zh: 也使他们忘却自我

translation.en: ♪ I do believe, pretty baby ♪
translation.zh: 我相信 亲爱的宝贝

translation.en: ♪ Believe I'll dust my broom ♪
translation.zh: 我会弹掉扫把上的尘埃

translation.en: [Terry] Most all these church folk, you say, "Where the blues come from?"
translation.zh: 如果你问大部分的教徒：“布鲁斯来自哪里？”

translation.en: "It came from the church."
translation.zh: “来自教堂”

translation.en: But that's a lie.
translation.zh: 那是一句谎言

translation.en: It didn't come from the church, it came from the field.
translation.zh: 它不是来自于教堂 它来自农田

translation.en: Out there in the field,
translation.zh: 就在那片田地

translation.en: they was playing instruments.
translation.zh: 他们以前在那里弹奏

translation.en: Harmonica.
translation.zh: 口琴

translation.en: "Oh baby" this and "oh baby" that.
translation.zh: “喔 宝贝 不要去那里

translation.en: ♪ Somebody gonna hurt you, woman Like you hurt me ♪
translation.zh: 会有人伤害你 姑娘就像你伤害了我一样”

translation.en: Weren't even talking about the woman.
translation.zh: 这里说的不是女人

translation.en: Talking about the man he's working for.
translation.zh: 而是他们所效力的种植园主人

translation.en: Nobody played the blues like the Mississippi folks.
translation.zh: 没有人像密西西比人一样演奏布鲁斯

translation.en: Because it's something that was in 'em already.
translation.zh: 因为那是早已存在在他们身上的东西

translation.en: [Steven] The musicians would play for the sharecroppers,
translation.zh: 音乐家会向佃农演奏

translation.en: but the sharecroppers didn't have any money.
translation.zh: 但佃农没有钱

translation.en: [Bruce] But city folks did.
translation.zh: 城市居民有钱

translation.en: So if you were a black musician at that time,
translation.zh: 所以如果你是当时的黑人音乐家

translation.en: you strap a guitar to your back, you stick your thumb out,
translation.zh: 你会背上吉他 搭上便车

translation.en: and you just go from town to town.
translation.zh: 从一个镇子到另一个镇子

translation.en: [man] You would travel by bus, train, walking down the street.
translation.zh: 你会坐公交、坐火车、沿着街道走

translation.en: However you could get there, and perform anywhere you could.
translation.zh: 用尽各种办法去你能到达的任何地方表演

translation.en: On a street corner, in a juke joint.
translation.zh: 在街角 在娱乐场

translation.en: Anywhere that there was an audience.
translation.zh: 任何有观众的地方

translation.en: If you're obsessed with remaining free from the cotton fields,
translation.zh: 如果你一心想从棉田里解放出来

translation.en: you gotta be able to play what people want,
translation.zh: 你就要弹奏任何别人想听的音乐

translation.en: so they played polkas, country music, pop songs.
translation.zh: 所以他们演奏波尔卡 乡村音乐流行音乐

translation.en: [Bruce] Also, by setting up on the sidewalk, the word would get out
translation.zh: 另外 通过街头表演音乐家来到镇子的消息

translation.en: that these musicians were in town.
translation.zh: 就会传开

translation.en: The owner of a juke would get in touch with them and say, "Well, you know,
translation.zh: 娱乐场的老板会联系他们说：

translation.en: can you come and play at my place tonight?"
translation.zh: “今晚你能到我这儿演奏吗？”

translation.en: [Terry] The juke joint was in city limits,
translation.zh: 娱乐场在城市里

translation.en: where black peoples could go and have a good time in town.
translation.zh: 黑人可以去那里度过一个城市里的美好时光

translation.en: They would dance, play music, drink beer, gamble.
translation.zh: 他们可以跳舞 演奏音乐喝啤酒 赌博

translation.en: Just together, you know, for the community.
translation.zh: 与同胞们聚在一起 联络感情

translation.en: [Bruce] Robert would work a town until he had it worked out...
translation.zh: 罗伯特会在一个镇演奏直到踏遍那里的每一个角落

translation.en: ...and then just get back on the road and go to the next town.
translation.zh: 然后继续上路 前往下一个地方

translation.en: [Taj] Robert Johnson on the road in his 20s, it was dangerous.
translation.zh: 对约翰逊这样一个20来岁的人来说出门在外是很危险的

translation.en: It was extremely dangerous.
translation.zh: 极度危险

translation.en: For a black man,
translation.zh: 对于一个黑人男子

translation.en: Mississippi was one of the most dangerous places in the world.
translation.zh: 密西西比是世界上最恐怖的地方之一

translation.en: If you lived in the upper south like the Virginias,
translation.zh: 如果你居住在上南方 比如弗吉尼亚

translation.en: even the Carolinas,
translation.zh: 甚至卡罗来纳

translation.en: the master would threaten you.
translation.zh: 农场主会威胁你：

translation.en: "You don't act right, I'm gonna send you down Mississippi.
translation.zh: “你要是不听话我就把你送到密西西比

translation.en: I'm gonna sell you."
translation.zh: 我要把你卖掉”

translation.en: And people were like,
translation.zh: 然后 人们就会说：

translation.en: "Whatever you do,
translation.zh: “做什么都行

translation.en: please don't send me down there,"
translation.zh: 请不要把我送到那里”

translation.en: 'cause they knew how badly they treated people.
translation.zh: 因为他们知道他们对待人有多残忍

translation.en: You're a black person, then you could be
translation.zh: 如果你是一个黑人 你可能会被

translation.en: killed, lynched,
translation.zh: 杀死 处私刑

translation.en: just on a whim.
translation.zh: 仅仅因为别人的一时兴起

translation.en: "Boy, I don't like you.
translation.zh: “孩子 我不喜欢你

translation.en: What do you say, fellas? Come on, let's..."
translation.zh: 你们意下如何 伙计？来 让我们…”

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 就是这样

translation.en: [Bruce] There were more lynchings in the Mississippi Delta
translation.zh: 和其他地方相比

translation.en: than anyplace else.
translation.zh: 在密西西比三角洲 处私刑更常见

translation.en: But it wasn't only the danger that made life difficult.
translation.zh: 但这不是唯一让生活艰难的原因 （一男子昨日被处以私刑）

translation.en: [Steven] A life on the road was even harder
translation.zh: 在路上的生活更难

translation.en: because most of the people in the towns were Christian,

translation.en: and the blues to them were considered the devil's music.
translation.zh: 布鲁斯对他们来说是魔鬼的音乐

translation.en: [Terry] Sunday morning come.
translation.zh: 周日早晨来了

translation.en: You got the preacher.
translation.zh: 你迎来了传教士

translation.en: He ain't making no money.
translation.zh: 他赚不了什么钱

translation.en: -All your men's mostly at the juke joint. -[cheering]
translation.zh: 而大部分男人都在 娱乐场

translation.en: Juke house been partying all night long.
translation.zh: 娱乐场会演奏一整晚

translation.en: People don't want me to tell it like this, but that's the way it is.
translation.zh: 人们不喜欢我说这些但事实就是这样

translation.en: -[church bell tolling] -The preacher,
translation.zh: 传教士

translation.en: he got a service going on.
translation.zh: 他在传经布道的时候

translation.zh: 这些人能赚一点小钱

translation.en: But Reverend ain't making none.

translation.zh: 听魔鬼的音乐 你会下地狱的

translation.en: Somebody get cut, somebody get in a fight,
translation.zh: 有些人被砍了 有些人陷入肢体冲突

translation.en: "that devil music is causing all this."
translation.zh: 魔鬼音乐造成了这些

translation.en: these womens in church,

translation.en: "Look, y'all don't start coming to church,

translation.en: you can go to hell listening to devil music."
translation.zh: 听魔鬼的音乐会让你们下地狱”

translation.en: [Bruce] Local legend has it
translation.zh: 当地的传说

translation.en: that...
translation.zh: 说…

translation.en: when he was 18 years old,
translation.zh: 当他18岁的时候

translation.en: Robert Johnson fell in love
translation.zh: 罗伯特约翰逊 和15岁的弗吉尼亚特拉维斯相爱了

translation.en: with a 15-year-old named Virginia Travis.
translation.zh: 和15岁的弗吉尼亚特拉维斯相爱了

translation.en: They lied about their ages and got married.
translation.zh: 他们隐瞒了自己的真实年龄 结了婚

translation.en: Her family were church people and very religious,
translation.zh: 她的家庭都是非常虔诚的教徒

translation.en: as were most people in that community on a plantation.
translation.zh: 那时在种植园的大部分人都是如此

translation.en: [Bruce] Robert made a pledge to Virginia
translation.zh: 罗伯特向弗吉尼亚保证

translation.en: that he would give up playing music
translation.zh: 他会放弃演奏音乐

translation.en: and he would become a legitimate farmhand
translation.zh: 会成为一个真正的农场工

translation.en: and he would be a good husband.
translation.zh: 成为一名好丈夫

translation.en: So they moved to a plantation
translation.zh: 所以他们搬到种植园

translation.en: and lived there
translation.zh: 住在那里

translation.en: until Virginia was eight-and-a-half months pregnant.
translation.zh: 直到弗吉尼亚怀有八个半月的身孕

translation.en: Virginia left to be with her grandmother to give birth to their baby,
translation.zh: 弗吉尼亚离家去了她祖母那里待产

translation.en: while Robert took advantage of the fact that Virginia was gone
translation.zh: 罗伯特趁弗吉尼亚离开

translation.en: to start playing the guitar again.
translation.zh: 又开始弹奏吉他

translation.en: He decided to work his way through some of his old familiar haunts
translation.zh: 他决定沿着一号公路往北走一路沿着密西西比河

translation.en: along the Mississippi River, up Highway 1,
translation.zh: 重温一些他所熟悉的常去的表演场地

translation.en: and arrive in time to see his wife and their new baby.
translation.zh: 并及时到达妻子和刚出世的孩子身边

translation.en: Well, Robert didn't make it in time.
translation.zh: 罗伯特抵达的时候已经晚了

translation.en: Virginia died in childbirth

translation.en: and was already dead and buried with the baby.
translation.zh: 和肚中的孩子一起埋葬

translation.en: [Keb'] ♪ And I followed her ♪
translation.zh: 我跟着她

translation.en: ♪ To the station ♪
translation.zh: 来到车站

translation.zh: 我跟着那个女孩来到车站

translation.en: ♪ With a suitcase in my hand ♪
translation.zh: 手上提着行李

translation.en: [Bruce] If you can just imagine this, I mean, it must've been
translation.zh: 只是想象一下 你就知道 那是很悲惨的一幕

translation.en: just such a tragic scene.
translation.zh: 那是很悲惨的一幕

translation.en: Here he is,
translation.zh: 他来了

translation.en: all excited to see his wife and new baby,
translation.zh: 怀着激动的心情来看妻子和孩子

translation.en: carrying his guitar, walking into this house,
translation.zh: 带着他的吉他 走进门

translation.en: and the family said,
translation.zh: 然后家里人说：

translation.en: "Where were you?
translation.zh: “你去哪了？

translation.en: You were out playing the devil's music."
translation.zh: 你在外面弹奏魔鬼的音乐”

translation.en: [Keb'] ♪ Well, you know It's hard to tell, it's hard to tell ♪
translation.zh: 你知道的 这很难说

translation.en: ♪ When all your love's in vain ♪
translation.zh: 当你所有的爱都是徒劳的

translation.en: ♪ All my love's in vain ♪
translation.zh: 我所有的爱都是徒劳的

translation.en: [Zeke] Her family blamed him for her death.
translation.zh: 她的家人将女儿的死怪罪于他

translation.en: ♪ You know, I felt so lonesome I felt so lonesome ♪
translation.zh: 你知道的 我感到很寂寞

translation.en: ♪ All I could do was cry ♪
translation.zh: 我只能哭泣

translation.en: ♪ When all your love's in vain ♪
translation.zh: 当你的爱都是徒劳的

translation.en: ♪ All my love's in vain ♪
translation.zh: 我的爱都是徒劳的

translation.en: [Bruce] According to contemporary scholars, it was after that
translation.zh: 据当代学者说 就在那之后

translation.en: that Robert's life really seems to change considerably.
translation.zh: 罗伯特的生活看上去发生了巨大的变化

translation.en: He dedicates his life to his music.
translation.zh: 他将生命投入音乐

translation.en: He wasn't satisfied just making a living.
translation.zh: 他不仅仅满足于谋生

translation.en: Robert Johnson wanted to be a big star.
translation.zh: 罗伯特约翰逊想成为大明星

translation.en: ♪ You know ♪
translation.zh: 你知道

translation.en: ♪ If I don't never No more see you, honey ♪
translation.zh: 如果我再也见不到你 宝贝 （森豪斯 音乐人）

translation.en: [Bruce] And then in July of 1930,
translation.zh: 之后 在1930年七月

translation.en: Son House moves to Robinsonville.
translation.zh: 森豪斯搬到鲁滨逊维尔

translation.en: Son House was older than Robert Johnson and he was an established player.
translation.zh: 森豪斯比罗伯特约翰逊年长他是一个杰出的演奏家

translation.en: Son House told me, Robert Johnson, as the new kid, goes,
translation.zh: 森豪斯告诉我罗伯特约翰逊作为一个新人 宣称：

translation.en: "I want to be like that guy."
translation.zh: “我想成为那个人”

translation.en: Robert was only making nickels and dimes on the corner playing his music
translation.zh: 罗伯特只能通过在角落弹奏音乐挣5分10分

translation.en: and he wanted to take it to another level.
translation.zh: 他想要达到另一个高度

translation.en: He wanted to go from the street corners to the juke joints
translation.zh: 他想从街角转移到娱乐场

translation.en: where that real money was.
translation.zh: 那里能真正赚钱

translation.en: [Zeke] Robert was said to have been a novice guitar player
translation.zh: 据说 罗伯特当时还是一名吉他新手

translation.en: who would go to see Son House and Willie Brown perform.
translation.zh: 常常会去看森豪斯和威利布朗的表演

translation.en: [Son] He'd follow me and Willie around.
translation.zh: 他跟着我和威利

translation.en: And every time we stopped to rest

translation.en: and set that ol' guitar over in the corner or something,

translation.en: he trying to play it and be just noising the people, you know.
translation.zh: 他就尝试演奏 就很招人烦

translation.en: And the folks, they'd come out, say,
translation.zh: 然后就会有人过来对我们说：

translation.en: "Why don't some of y'all go down and make that boy
translation.zh: “你们怎么不找个人告诉那个孩子

translation.en: put that thing down, he running us crazy."
translation.zh: 放下乐器 他要把我们逼疯了”

translation.en: [Taj] According to Son House,
translation.zh: 据森豪斯说

translation.en: Robert would go to fooling around with the guitars,

translation.en: and they didn't want him to fool with the guitars
translation.zh: 他们不想让他乱弹

translation.en: because he might break a string.
translation.zh: 因为他可能会弄断琴弦

translation.en: So they used to keep running. "Boy, get away from around here."
translation.zh: 所以他们经常说：“孩子 离那里远一点儿”

translation.en: You know, he was, like, in the way.
translation.zh: 他就像个碍事的家伙

translation.en: [Bruce] So Robert supposedly said, "Well, you know, I'll show you."
translation.zh: 据说罗伯特回应道：“我会向你证明”

translation.en: And then he disappears from the Delta.
translation.zh: 然后他从三角洲消失了

translation.en: Nobody knows where he went
translation.zh: 近一年的时间里

translation.en: for about a year.
translation.zh: 没人知道他去哪了

translation.en: But then Son and Willie Brown
translation.zh: 然而有一天 森和威利布朗

translation.en: were playing at a juke in Banks, Mississippi.
translation.zh: 在密西西比娱乐场演奏的时候

translation.en: And in the door comes Robert Johnson carrying a guitar.
translation.zh: （1930年代早期） 罗伯特约翰逊从门口走进来手里拿着吉他

translation.en: And Son says to Willie...
translation.zh: 森对威利说：

translation.en: [Son] Look who's coming in the door, got a guitar on his back.
translation.zh: “看看谁来了 还背了把吉他”

translation.en: He said, "Oh, that's little Robert." I said, "Yeah, that's him."
translation.zh: 他说：“那是小罗伯特”我说：“是的 就是他”

translation.en: I said, "Boy, now where you going with that thing?
translation.zh: 我说：“孩子你拿着那个东西想怎么着？

translation.en: To noise somebody else to death again?"
translation.zh: 想把人烦死吗？”

translation.en: He said, "No, just give me a try." I said, "Well, okay."
translation.zh: 他说：“让我试试” 我说：“那好吧”

translation.en: He had an extra string he put on
translation.zh: 他加了一根弦

translation.en: a six-string guitar, made him have-- it's a seven-string.
translation.zh: 他本来有把六弦琴 现在是七弦琴

translation.en: Something I ain't never saw before, none of us.
translation.zh: 我从来没见过 所有人都没见过

translation.en: ♪ Hot tamales and they're red hot ♪
translation.zh: 热的玉米粉蒸肉 热得发烫

translation.en: ♪ Yes, she got 'em for sale ♪
translation.zh: 对 她在打折时买的

translation.en: ♪ Hot tamales and they're red hot ♪
translation.zh: 热的玉米粉蒸肉 热得发烫

translation.en: ♪ Yes, she got 'em for sale ♪
translation.zh: 对 她在打折时买的

translation.en: ♪ I got a girl, say she long and tall ♪

translation.en: ♪ Sleeps in the kitchen With her feets in the hall ♪
translation.zh: 在厨房睡觉时 脚能伸到过道那去

translation.en: [Son] And when that boy started playing,
translation.zh: 然后这个男孩开始演奏

translation.en: oh, he was gone!
translation.zh: 过去的他已经不存在了

translation.en: [Bruce] Robert's so good,
translation.zh: 罗伯特太棒了

translation.en: everybody is just blown away.
translation.zh: 每个人都被震惊了

translation.en: Son said, "We were just all standing there with our mouths open,
translation.zh: 森说：“我们都目瞪口呆地站在那儿

translation.en: saying, 'Now, ain't that fast.'"
translation.zh: 说‘这也太快了吧？’”

translation.en: [Steven] He was playing in a way that they'd never heard before.
translation.zh: 他用一种我们从来没见过的方式弹奏

translation.en: He was playing that same guitar
translation.zh: 他的琴技令人瞠目结舌

translation.en: they said he couldn't hold a tune in a bucket.
translation.zh: 他们曾经说他没一个音在调上

translation.en: Now he's outplaying everybody.
translation.zh: 现在他比任何人弹得都好

translation.en: [Karlos] And one moment, Johnson is the mediocre to a bad guitar player.
translation.zh: 约翰逊过去的吉他水平介于差到中等之间

translation.en: A year and a half later, he's an impresario.
translation.zh: 一年半之后 他是大师

translation.en: He's doing things with the guitar
translation.zh: 他用吉他做的事

translation.en: that even his mentors can't do.
translation.zh: 连他的导师都做不到

translation.en: [Bruce] This begins the whole myth of...
translation.zh: 这就开始了

translation.en: how could Robert possibly have gotten that good that fast?
translation.zh: 罗伯特的琴技为何会突飞猛进的传说

translation.en: [Taj] He did something.
translation.zh: 他做了什么事

translation.en: You don't just go away and come back playing like that.
translation.zh: 你不可能远走他乡回来就能把吉他弹成那样

translation.en: [Terry] This man was a nobody.
translation.zh: 这个男人曾经默默无闻

translation.en: And all of a sudden,
translation.zh: 突然之间

translation.en: he's on top of the world.
translation.zh: 他就站在了世界的顶峰

translation.en: That put fear in people that...
translation.zh: 这让人们感到恐惧

translation.en: he been hangin' out at the crossroads.
translation.zh: 他一直在十字路口游走

translation.en: This man ain't nothing but a devil.
translation.zh: 这个男人肯定是魔鬼

translation.en: [man] The myth goes...
translation.zh: 传说

translation.en: Robert went to the crossroads.
translation.zh: 罗伯特在十字路口

translation.en: [softly] And he's supposed to have gotten down on his knees...
translation.zh: 他双膝跪地

translation.en: handed his guitar to the devil.
translation.zh: 把他的吉他交给魔鬼

translation.en: And the devil's supposed to have tuned his guitar.
translation.zh: 魔鬼调适了他的吉他

translation.en: And before he got the guitar back,
translation.zh: 在他拿回吉他之前

translation.en: the devil said, "Once you receive the guitar,
translation.zh: 魔鬼说：“你一旦接受了这把吉他

translation.en: your soul is mine.
translation.zh: 你的灵魂就是我的了

translation.en: Do you want it?"
translation.zh: 你想要这吉他吗？”

translation.en: That's how he sold his soul to the devil.
translation.zh: 他就是这样将灵魂卖给魔鬼的

translation.en: [Steven] Some of the lyrics that he wrote,
translation.zh: 从他写的歌词中

translation.en: it would make one think,
translation.zh: 人们不禁会想：

translation.en: "Maybe he did sell his soul to the devil."
translation.zh: “他可能真的把灵魂卖给了魔鬼”

translation.en: Talking about hellhounds on his trail,
translation.zh: 歌词讲述了地狱犬追着他跑

translation.en: and, "Me and the devil was walking side-by-side."
translation.zh: 还有“我和魔鬼并肩前行”

translation.en: But if you believe the myth,
translation.zh: 但如果你相信这个传说

translation.en: it didn't just end with Robert Johnson selling his soul.
translation.zh: 罗伯特约翰逊出卖自己的灵魂并不是故事的结束

translation.en: Because if you do make a deal with the devil,
translation.zh: 因为如果你真的和魔鬼进行了交易

translation.en: you gonna have to pay the price.
translation.zh: 你必须付出代价

translation.en: [woman] The story of Robert Johnson
translation.zh: 罗伯特约翰逊到十字路口

translation.en: going down to the crossroads and making a bargain with the devil,
translation.zh: 和魔鬼达成交易的故事

translation.en: I think it's reflecting on a tradition in African American folklore called "hoodoo."
translation.zh: 在我看来反映了非裔美国人民俗中一个叫做“巫毒”的传统

translation.en: African American styles of magic.
translation.zh: 即非裔美国人式的魔法

translation.en: And hoodoo has these stories of people going down to a crossroad
translation.zh: 巫毒中有类似的故事人们到达十字路口

translation.en: and meeting up with an entity who offers some sort of insight or knowledge,
translation.zh: 遇到一个能给予他思想和知识的个体

translation.en: to learn all kinds of things.
translation.zh: 以便他们学习各种事情

translation.en: So hoodoo was seen as a way of gaining control
translation.zh: 因此 巫毒被视为一种能在

translation.en: in a world that was suffused by violence and limited options.
translation.zh: 充满暴力和有限选择的世界里夺回主动权的方式

translation.en: Hoodoo gave people other possibilities for living in that world.
translation.zh: 巫毒让人们有了在世界上存活的另一种可能

translation.en: [Zeke] Robert Johnson's lyrics are filled with hoodoo references.
translation.zh: 罗伯特约翰逊的歌词充满了和巫毒有关的东西

translation.en: In the song "Come on in My Kitchen,"
translation.zh: 在他的歌《请来我的厨房》中

translation.en: he sings a line,
translation.zh: 这样唱道：

translation.en: "I've taken the last nickel out of her nation sack."
translation.zh: “我从她的巫毒囊袋里拿走了最后一个5分硬币”

translation.en: [Robert] ♪ Oh, she's gone ♪
translation.zh: 她走了

translation.en: ♪ I know she won't come back ♪
translation.zh: 我知道她不会回来了

translation.en: ♪ I've taken the last nickel ♪
translation.zh: 我从她的巫毒囊袋里

translation.en: ♪ Out of her nation sack ♪
translation.zh: 拿走了最后一个5分硬币

translation.en: [Yvonne] The "nation sack" or "mojo bag"
translation.zh: 巫毒囊袋或魔力袋

translation.en: was a luck charm that a woman wore around her waist.
translation.zh: 是女人戴在腰间的护身符

translation.en: This was a woman's sexual power.
translation.zh: 是女人的性能量

translation.en: It's a way of keeping the man with her.
translation.zh: 是让男人留在她身边的方法

translation.en: So by removing the contents of a woman's nation sack,
translation.zh: 所以通过拿走一个女人袋子里的东西

translation.en: this woman no longer has the power over him,
translation.zh: 这个女人就再也没有支配他的能力了

translation.en: and now he can invite whoever he wants to into his kitchen.
translation.zh: 现在他可以邀请任何人来他的厨房

translation.en: We also have to think about how we are only one generation
translation.zh: 我们还要考虑的一点是 我们与奴隶制之间只隔了一代人

translation.en: removed from slavery.
translation.zh: 我们与奴隶制之间只隔了一代人

translation.en: And so in "Hellhound on My Trail,"
translation.zh: 所以在《追着我跑的地狱犬》中

translation.en: Johnson talks about sprinkling hot powder at his door.
translation.zh: 约翰逊谈到了在门前撒上热粉

translation.en: [Robert] ♪ You sprinkled hot foot powder ♪
translation.zh: 你撒了热粉

translation.en: ♪ Mmm, around my door ♪
translation.zh: 在我的门前

translation.en: [Karlos] African Americans refer to "hot powder"
translation.zh: 非裔美国人所说的“热粉”

translation.en: as a means to evade bloodhounds.
translation.zh: 是逃避地狱犬的手段

translation.en: ♪ A hellhound on my trail ♪
translation.zh: 追着我跑的地狱犬

translation.en: ♪ Still out on my trail ♪
translation.zh: 仍然对我穷追不舍

translation.en: [Karlos] That would have been used by someone fleeing a lynch mob.
translation.zh: 这本来是逃离私刑暴徒的人使用的

translation.en: And so if we think about Robert Johnson's stepfather,
translation.zh: 如果我们想想罗伯特约翰逊的继父

translation.en: Charles Dodds,
translation.zh: 查尔斯多德斯

translation.en: that's a reference to, perhaps, how he evaded a near-lynching.
translation.zh: 这可能就是指他从私刑暴徒手中险象环生的事

translation.en: So I think that that expresses the psychological torment
translation.zh: 我认为那表达了因为担心随时会被处以私刑

translation.en: of feeling like lynching is always around the corner,
translation.zh: 而遭受的精神创伤

translation.en: it's always a possibility, you are never safe.
translation.zh: 私刑随时可能发生 你一刻都不安全

translation.en: [Yvonne] At the time when Robert Johnson was performing these songs
translation.zh: 罗伯特约翰逊为非裔美国人尤其是黑人男子

translation.en: that had hoodoo references,
translation.zh: 演奏这些歌的时候

translation.en: for African Americans, and black men in particular.
translation.zh: 会含有巫毒的内容

translation.en: it is addressing the realities of their world,
translation.zh: 歌词讲述了他们所处世界的现实面貌

translation.en: and finding power in this magic.
translation.zh: 他们在这种魔法中寻找力量

translation.en: [Zeke] I believe Robert Johnson's association with hoodoo
translation.zh: 我认为罗伯特约翰逊和巫毒的关联

translation.en: and using the references in his lyrics empowered him.
translation.zh: 以及在歌词里对巫毒相关内容的运用给予了他力量

translation.en: It was, "Yeah, if you mess with me,
translation.zh: 好像在说：“如果你对我使坏

translation.en: something bad's gonna happen to you because it's not just me,
translation.zh: 就会有不好的事情发生在你身上因为这不仅仅是关于我

translation.en: it's the power behind me."
translation.zh: 还关于我背后的力量”

translation.en: [Keb'] I don't know where the crossroads story came from,
translation.zh: 我不知道十字路口的传说是从何而来

translation.en: but I believe to my core...
translation.zh: 但我深信

translation.en: even if Robert Johnson actually met the devil,
translation.zh: 即使罗伯特约翰逊真的遇到了恶魔

translation.en: even if it really happened, that it's a metaphor,
translation.zh: 即使真实发生了 这只是一个比喻

translation.en: a wake-up call
translation.zh: 是一个人认识自我

translation.en: for a person to go ahead and become who they are.
translation.zh: 是一个人认识自我 并努力实现自我的觉醒

translation.en: [Bruce] While the myth of the crossroads has always intrigued people,
translation.zh: 虽然十字路口的传说总是令人好奇

translation.en: there's some evidence that Robert's incredible transformation
translation.zh: 有些证据表明罗伯特惊人的转变

translation.en: can be traced back to another story about his life.
translation.zh: 其实在另一个故事中有迹可循

translation.en: [Steven] My grandfather, Robert Johnson, left the Delta
translation.zh: 我的祖父 罗伯特约翰逊离开三角洲

translation.en: and he came back to his birth town,
translation.zh: 回到他出生的小镇

translation.en: Hazlehurst, Mississippi,
translation.zh: 密西西比黑泽尔赫斯特

translation.en: and he was looking for Noah Johnson who was his biological father.
translation.zh: 他在寻找诺亚约翰逊 即他的生父

translation.en: In searching for Noah, he found his mentor, Ike Zimmerman.
translation.zh: 在寻找诺亚的过程中他找到了自己的导师艾克齐默尔曼

translation.en: [Bruce] Ike was known throughout Southern Mississippi as being
translation.zh: 艾克在整个密西西比南部

translation.en: the best guitarist there was.
translation.zh: 以最棒的吉他手为人所知

translation.en: [Steven] Story has it that Ike Zimmerman and my granddad
translation.zh: 据说 艾克齐默尔曼和我祖父

translation.en: used to go in the cemetery across from Ike's home,
translation.zh: 会去艾克家对面的 距黑泽尔赫斯特以南几公里远的公墓

translation.en: a few miles south of Hazlehurst,
translation.zh: 距黑泽尔赫斯特以南几公里远的公墓

translation.en: and they would practice there.
translation.zh: 他们会在那里练习

translation.en: Ike told my granddad, "Robert, look,
translation.zh: 艾克告诉我祖父：“罗伯特 听着

translation.en: I don't care how bad you sound out here.
translation.zh: 我不管你在这里弹得多难听

translation.en: Nobody out here is gonna complain."
translation.zh: 没有人会抱怨”

translation.en: [Robert] ♪ I got a kindhearted woman ♪
translation.zh: 我有一个好心的女人

translation.en: ♪ Do anything in this world for me ♪
translation.zh: 为我做任何事

translation.en: ♪ Anything in this world for me ♪
translation.zh: 为我做任何事

translation.en: [Steven] He was actually sharpening his craft
translation.zh: 他和自己的导师艾克齐默尔曼一起

translation.en: with Ike Zimmerman as his mentor.
translation.zh: 磨练自己的技能

translation.en: ♪ I got a kindhearted woman... ♪
translation.zh: 我有一个好心的女人

translation.en: [Bruce] Ike always said
translation.zh: 艾克总是说

translation.en: that the only way to learn how to play the blues
translation.zh: 学习演奏布鲁斯的唯一方法

translation.en: was to sit on a gravestone
translation.zh: 就是在午夜的公墓里

translation.en: at midnight in a cemetery.
translation.zh: 坐在墓碑上

translation.en: And then the "haints,"
translation.zh: 然后“亨兹”

translation.en: which is a southern word for "ghosts" or 'spirits,"
translation.zh: 即南部方言里的鬼或灵魂

translation.en: would come out,
translation.zh: 会出现

translation.en: and they would teach you how to play the blues.
translation.zh: 他们会告诉你如何演奏布鲁斯

translation.en: They chose this grave
translation.zh: 他们选择这个墓地

translation.en: so that they could sit facing each other.
translation.zh: 这样他们就能面对面坐着

translation.en: And Ike would be able to teach Robert everything that he knew
translation.zh: 艾克会传授罗伯特所有他知道的

translation.en: about playing the guitar.
translation.zh: 演奏吉他的知识

translation.en: [Robert] ♪ She's a kindhearted woman ♪
translation.zh: 她是一个好心的女人

translation.en: ♪ She studies evil all the time ♪
translation.zh: 她总是研究邪恶

translation.en: [Steven] Some people say that it was my granddad's hard work and practice with Ike
translation.zh: 有些人说是我祖父的努力和与艾克一起练习的经历

translation.en: that transformed him.
translation.zh: 成就了他的转变

translation.en: ♪ She studies evil all the time ♪
translation.zh: 她总是研究邪恶

translation.en: But it was his playing music in the graveyard
translation.zh: 但他在墓地里演奏的事实

translation.en: that perpetuated the myth
translation.zh: 延续了

translation.en: that he actually sold his soul to the devil.
translation.zh: 他出卖灵魂给恶魔的传说

translation.en: ♪ To have it on your mind ♪
translation.zh: 把它记在心里

translation.en: ♪ I got stones in my passway... ♪
translation.zh: 我路上的石头…

translation.en: [Rory] Robert Johnson had this amazing technique.
translation.zh: 罗伯特约翰逊有惊人的技术

translation.en: It's a contrast and a drama,
translation.zh: 从浮动的旋律 节奏和音量

translation.en: from fluctuating rhythms and tempos and volumes,
translation.zh: 还有音乐的呼吸上来说

translation.en: and the breathing of the music.
translation.zh: 它是矛盾且具有戏剧性的

translation.en: ♪ ...tell my friend called Willie Brown ♪
translation.zh: 告诉我的朋友威利布朗

translation.en: It's outside the box.
translation.zh: 别出心裁 极富创意

translation.en: [Bruce] Robert was a really smart person,
translation.zh: 罗伯特是一个很聪明的人

translation.en: and he was very protective of how he was doing what he was doing.
translation.zh: 在演奏技巧和手法上他对其他人非常有戒备心

translation.en: So if he saw you watching him play,
translation.zh: 所以如果他看到你在看他演奏

translation.en: he would either turn his back on you or stop playing.
translation.zh: 他要么会转过身 要么停止演奏

translation.en: Johnson was the first guy you hear on record to do that sound,
translation.zh: 约翰逊是你能听到的第一个在唱片里演奏这种声音的人

translation.en: and he combined it with the slide,
translation.zh: 他融合了滑音

translation.en: so it sounded like one guitar playing up here, uh, melodies,
translation.zh: 所以听起来像一个吉他在这里弹奏

translation.en: while another was playing bass,
translation.zh: 但另一个在弹奏贝斯

translation.en: which I believe he was doing with his thumb,
translation.zh: 我认为他是用拇指在弹

translation.en: 'cause he had large hands.
translation.zh: 因为他有一双大手

translation.en: [Terry] My grandfather said, "Oh boy, Robert,
translation.zh: 我祖父说：“天呐 罗伯特

translation.en: his fingers were so long
translation.zh: 他的手指特别长

translation.en: and he could do stuff that you would never be able to do."
translation.zh: 他能做到你永远做不到的事”

translation.en: Can you imagine a guy playing,
translation.zh: 你能想象一个人在演奏

translation.en: got these fingers doing one thing
translation.zh: 用这些手指做一件事

translation.en: and these others doing some other stuff?
translation.zh: 用其他手指做别的事吗？

translation.en: Got two or three things going different, you know?
translation.zh: 同时做两三件不同的事

translation.en: But he could do that.
translation.zh: 但他能做到

translation.en: [man] There's a sort of synchronization about the way he plays,
translation.zh: 他弹奏的方式具有某种同步性

translation.en: when he plays a little rhythm piece and then...
translation.zh: 当他弹奏一小段旋律时 （基思理查兹 音乐人）

translation.en: just one slide note can kill you, man.
translation.zh: 一个滑音就能让你震惊

translation.en: [Terry] The big thing about Robert Johnson,
translation.zh: 关于罗伯特约翰逊最伟大的事是

translation.en: the piano sound that he had
translation.zh: 在他手里 吉他能发出

translation.en: on the guitar.
translation.zh: 钢琴的声音

translation.en: Nobody can do that.
translation.zh: 没有人能做到

translation.en: One part of what he's playing
translation.zh: 他弹奏的一部分

translation.en: is talking to the other part,
translation.zh: 是在和另一部分对话

translation.en: and he's the part in the middle.
translation.zh: 他是中间的部分

translation.en: That doesn't sound like much to us 'cause we've heard it a million times.
translation.zh: 这对我们来说没什么因为我们已经听了无数遍

translation.en: But when he did it, no one else was yet doing that,
translation.zh: 但当他这么做的时候没有人那么做过

translation.en: and that becomes the building block of electric blues,
translation.zh: 这变成了电子布鲁斯的组成元素

translation.en: and if you change it into that,
translation.zh: 如果你改变一下它

translation.en: the building block of rock and roll.
translation.zh: 就是摇滚乐的元素

translation.en: ♪ Come on... ♪
translation.zh: 来…

translation.en: [Keith] To me, the most fascinating thing about playing guitar
translation.zh: 对我来说 弹吉他最棒的事

translation.en: is playing with the other guy,
translation.zh: 是和别人一起弹奏

translation.en: and luckily Robert didn't have to worry about that
translation.zh: 幸运的是 罗伯特不用担心这个

translation.en: 'cause he could do it all by himself, man, you know.
translation.zh: 因为他一个人能完成所有

translation.en: ♪ Sweet home Chicago ♪
translation.zh: 美丽的家芝加哥

translation.en: [Robert] ♪ I woke up this morning ♪
translation.zh: 我今早醒来

translation.en: ♪ Feelin' round for my shoes... ♪
translation.zh: 用手四处翻找我的鞋

translation.en: [Bruce] Robert recorded a total of 29 songs for the American Record Company.
translation.zh: 罗伯特一共为美国唱片公司录了29首歌

translation.en: And in his Delta region, his popularity took off.
translation.zh: 在三角洲地区 他飞速成名

translation.en: [Steven] Although his success was great,
translation.zh: 虽然他的成就很伟大

translation.en: I believe there was still a part of him
translation.zh: 我相信一部分的他还是希望

translation.en: that wanted a normal life with a family.

translation.en: [Taj] ♪ Some people say the low-down blues ♪
translation.zh: 有些人说最动情的蓝调

translation.en: ♪ Whoa, they ain't so bad ♪

translation.en: ♪ Worst ol' feeling, baby ♪
translation.zh: 这是我有史以来

translation.en: ♪ Most I ever had ♪
translation.zh: 最坏的感受 宝贝

translation.en: ♪ Some people say the low-down blues ♪
translation.zh: 有些人说最动情的蓝调

translation.en: [Bruce] He meets Virgie Cain and she became pregnant.
translation.zh: 他遇到了弗吉肯 她怀孕了

translation.en: Virgie was a schoolgirl,
translation.zh: 弗吉是个学生

translation.en: and Robert made repeated attempts to get Virgie to come away with him.
translation.zh: 罗伯特用尽各种办法 想让弗吉和他一起走

translation.en: But Virgie came from a very strict, religious family
translation.zh: 但弗吉来自一个很虔诚的宗教家庭

translation.en: and Virgie's family said, "No, you're not going with that boy
translation.zh: 弗吉的家人说：“不 你不能跟着那个男孩

translation.en: because that boy plays the blues, that boy plays the devil's music."
translation.zh: 因为他弹奏布鲁斯他弹奏魔鬼的音乐”

translation.en: Here we go again.
translation.zh: 历史重演

translation.en: Yet another potential wife
translation.zh: 又一个可能成为他妻子

translation.en: and child is taken away from him.
translation.zh: 并为他生下孩子的女人离开了他

translation.en: Why? Because he played the blues.
translation.zh: 为什么？因为他演奏布鲁斯

translation.en: ♪ Well, you know about that, I had ♪
translation.zh: 你知道的 我有

translation.en: ♪ Had them ol' walking blues ♪
translation.zh: 拥有行走的布鲁斯

translation.en: Robert...
translation.zh: 罗伯特

translation.en: Lee Johnson.
translation.zh: 李约翰逊

translation.en: -[continues indistinctly] -[Steven] My father, Claude,

translation.en: didn't have a relationship
translation.zh: 和他父亲

translation.en: with his father,
translation.zh: 罗伯特约翰逊

translation.en: Robert Johnson.
translation.zh: 没有联系

translation.en: [Michael] My dad only saw his father twice.
translation.zh: 我父亲只见过他父亲两次

translation.en: Neither time did he get a chance to really talk to his father.
translation.zh: 每次都没有机会真正地和他父亲交谈

translation.en: [Claude] I remember him
translation.zh: 我记得他

translation.en: because the second time he came to my grandfather and grandmother's home
translation.zh: 因为他第二次来到我祖父母家

translation.en: to visit me, I was near seven years old.
translation.zh: 看望我时 我快七岁了

translation.en: [Steven] And my dad was looking out the window.
translation.zh: 我的父亲看着窗外

translation.en: My great-grandfather said, "Nope,
translation.zh: 我曾祖父说：“不

translation.en: I can't let my grandson
translation.zh: 我不能让我的曾孙

translation.en: be a part of the devil's music life."
translation.zh: 成为魔鬼音乐人生的一部分”

translation.en: [Rory] Claude told me that he saw his dad saying,
translation.zh: 克劳德告诉我说他看到自己的父亲说：

translation.en: "Here's money for Claude."
translation.zh: “这是给克劳德的钱”

translation.en: He gave money for Grandpa to give to his child,
translation.zh: 他把钱给祖父再让他把钱给自己的孩子

translation.en: he tried to do the right thing.
translation.zh: 他尝试着做对的事情

translation.en: [Claude] And I remember him right now,
translation.zh: 我现在都还记得他

translation.en: just like it happened.
translation.zh: 一切都历历在目

translation.en: But I never seen him again.
translation.zh: 但我再也没见过他

translation.en: Robert's life was just one tragedy built upon another tragedy.
translation.zh: 罗伯特的一生就是悲剧的叠加

translation.en: It just seems to never end for him.
translation.zh: 对他来说永远不能结束

translation.en: And so he devotes his life to being a hard-drinking,
translation.zh: 所以他成为了一个酗酒

translation.en: womanizing,
translation.zh: 风流成性

translation.en: blaspheming,
translation.zh: 亵渎上帝的

translation.en: blues musician,
translation.zh: 布鲁斯音乐家

translation.en: who doesn't seem to really care much
translation.zh: 除了音乐

translation.en: about anybody or anything other than his music.
translation.zh: 他好像并不关心任何别的人或事

translation.en: ♪ Yesterday ♪
translation.zh: 昨天

translation.en: ♪ Had to be the devil ♪
translation.zh: 一定是恶魔

translation.en: ♪ Changed my baby's mind ♪
translation.zh: 改变了我宝贝的思想

translation.en: [Jimmy] Now, Robert, he wanted to be identified with the devil.
translation.zh: 现在 罗伯特想要用恶魔定义自己

translation.en: He wanted you to think he was the devilest person.
translation.zh: 他想让你认为他是个邪恶的人

translation.en: Robert Johnson traveled from small town to small town,
translation.zh: 罗伯特约翰逊从一个小镇到另一个小镇

translation.en: juke joint, juke house, making a living.
translation.zh: 到娱乐场 娱乐房谋生

translation.en: ♪ Changed my baby's mind ♪
translation.zh: 改变我宝贝的思想

translation.en: [Jimmy] He could do things and go places
translation.zh: 他能做一般人做不到的事

translation.en: that maybe just an ordinary person couldn't do.
translation.zh: 去一般人去不了的地方

translation.en: He wore that title.
translation.zh: 他带着那个头衔

translation.en: Man of Hell, Man of the Devil.
translation.zh: 地狱的男人 恶魔的男人的头衔

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause I know it wasn't nothing But the devil ♪
translation.zh: 因为我知道那不是别的 是魔鬼

translation.en: ♪ Made you change your mind ♪
translation.zh: 改变了你的思想

translation.en: [Steven] I really believe that, you know, he was searching for a freedom within,
translation.zh: 我真的认为他一直在寻找内心的自由

translation.en: he was searching for soul freedom.
translation.zh: 为自己的灵魂寻找自由

translation.en: And in searching for that,
translation.zh: 在寻找的过程中

translation.en: it caused him to act in the way that he did a lot of times,
translation.zh: 他开始惯常地做出一些举动

translation.en: as far as the drinking and the women.
translation.zh: 就是和酒精 女人有关的事

translation.en: Ol' Robert did like to drink a lot of whiskey
translation.zh: 罗伯特喝了很多威士忌

translation.en: -and crazy 'bout his womens. -[interviewer] Yeah.
translation.zh: 而且为女人疯狂

translation.en: That's two things he was crazy about, whiskey and womens.
translation.zh: 只有两件他为之疯狂的事情威士忌和女人

translation.en: [John] Honeyboy was another blues player who had traveled with Robert Johnson
translation.zh: 蜜糖男孩是另一个 和罗伯特约翰逊一起旅行的布鲁斯演奏家

translation.en: and played with Robert on street corners, that kind of stuff.
translation.zh: 和罗伯特一起在街角演出之类的

translation.en: And they were actually playing together the night
translation.zh: 一天晚上 他们在一起演奏

translation.en: that my granddad's lifestyle caught up with him,
translation.zh: 而就在那晚我祖父的生活方式影响了他

translation.en: at a blues juke joint outside of Greenwood, Mississippi
translation.zh: 在密西西比格林伍德外的一个

translation.en: called Three Forks.
translation.zh: 叫“三把叉子”的娱乐场

translation.en: [man] Next to this highway over here,
translation.zh: 就在公路旁

translation.en: there was a big juke house, but all this was flat in here.
translation.zh: 那里以前有个大的娱乐场但这里是平的

translation.en: -Ahh. -And the big archives, man, you should--
translation.zh: 是个大建筑

translation.en: right behind, betwixt this side and that, right behind the store.
translation.zh: 就在后面 在这边和那边的中间就在商店后面

translation.en: This is the place.
translation.zh: 这里就是

translation.en: [Bruce] Robert had taken up
translation.zh: 罗伯特在这里

translation.en: with the wife of one of the people
translation.zh: 和一名“三把叉子”娱乐场

translation.en: who worked at the Three Forks juke.
translation.zh: 工作人员的妻子发生了关系

translation.en: [man] One night at the club,
translation.zh: 有一天晚上 在酒吧里

translation.en: he let his arrogance...
translation.zh: 他的傲慢… （比尔皮特 音乐人）

translation.en: go too far.
translation.zh: …过了头

translation.en: Totally disrespecting,
translation.zh: 彻底冒犯了

translation.en: you know, the woman's husband.
translation.zh: 这个女人的丈夫

translation.en: And they ordered a bottle of whiskey,
translation.zh: 他们点了一瓶威士忌

translation.en: and when they brought him the whiskey,
translation.zh: 当服务生送来威士忌时

translation.en: the seal was broke,
translation.zh: 酒封已经被打开

translation.en: and I don't remember who it was,
translation.zh: 我不记得是谁

translation.en: but he tried to slap the bottle out of Robert's hands.
translation.zh: 但他试着把罗伯特手里的酒瓶打翻

translation.en: He said, "Man, never drink out of a bottle when the seal is broke."
translation.zh: 他说：“伙计永远不要喝开封了的酒”

translation.en: So Robert tells him,
translation.zh: 罗伯特告诉他：

translation.en: "And don't you ever slap another $7 bottle of whiskey out of my hand."
translation.zh: “你永远不要从我手里打掉7美金的威士忌”

translation.en: [Terry] My dad always said, "Don't never drink nothing from nobody
translation.zh: 我的父亲总是说：“永远不要喝任何人给你的

translation.en: if he bring it to you open."
translation.zh: 已经开封的饮料”

translation.en: But the man gave Robert the alcohol.
translation.zh: 这个男人给罗伯特的酒

translation.en: There was poison in it.
translation.zh: 下了毒

translation.en: And he drank it that day.
translation.zh: 那天他喝了下去

translation.en: [Jimmy] Some say the lady did it, some say the lady's boyfriend did it,
translation.zh: 有人说是一个女人做的有人说是那个女人的男朋友做的

translation.en: some of them said the house man did it.
translation.zh: 有人说是酒吧老板做的

translation.en: All they could say is that he was poisoned.
translation.zh: 唯一可以确定的是 他被下毒了

translation.en: [Rory] According to Honeyboy,
translation.zh: 根据蜜糖男孩说的

translation.en: Robert was kind of slumped over in the chair,
translation.zh: 罗伯特跌下椅子

translation.en: and people there were trying to get him to take another drink
translation.zh: 人们想让他再喝一杯

translation.en: so he'd keep playing, and he just wasn't able to.
translation.zh: 让他继续演奏 但他做不到

translation.en: [Bill] That night, he was basically on his hands and knees and stuff,
translation.zh: 那天晚上 他基本上是四肢撑地

translation.en: you know, howling like a wolf or something.
translation.zh: 像狼一样嚎叫

translation.en: He was hurting so bad.
translation.zh: 他很痛苦

translation.en: It took a long time for him to die, like two or three days.
translation.zh: 死亡的时间很漫长 持续了两三天

translation.en: He was real sick.
translation.zh: 他病得很严重

translation.en: [Bill] What a hell of a way to go out,
translation.zh: 这种死法真是太离奇了

translation.en: you know, because of his ego
translation.zh: 因为他的自傲

translation.en: and his lust, you know.
translation.zh: 他的情欲

translation.en: What a waste.
translation.zh: 多么可惜

translation.en: That's the way I see it.
translation.zh: 这是我的感受

translation.en: [Terry] But the man who gave Robert this poison whiskey,
translation.zh: 但那个给罗伯特毒威士忌的人

translation.en: the man got off free.
translation.zh: 没有受到任何惩处

translation.en: They come to him, but they didn't arrest him.
translation.zh: 他们找到了他 但并没有逮捕他

translation.en: They do nothing.
translation.zh: 他们什么也没做

translation.en: And the black people didn't push it. You know why?
translation.zh: 黑人也没有抗议 你知道为什么吗？

translation.en: Robert Johnson... sang devil music.
translation.zh: 罗伯特约翰逊唱魔鬼音乐

translation.en: [Karlos] Robert Johnson,
translation.zh: 罗伯特约翰逊

translation.en: because he was this walking blues man,
translation.zh: 因为他是行走的布鲁斯男人

translation.en: because he was sort of a rebel,
translation.zh: 因为他是某种反叛

translation.en: because he played by his own rules,
translation.zh: 因为他按自己的方式行事

translation.en: it ended up costing him.
translation.zh: 最后付出了惨重的代价

translation.en: People who want to see Johnson's death
translation.zh: 有些人想把约翰逊的死看作是

translation.en: as evidence of this deal with the devil,
translation.zh: 他和魔鬼交易的证据

translation.en: it is the bill coming due,
translation.zh: 付出代价的时候到了

translation.en: and paying for this great musical ability
translation.zh: 而他为他杰出的音乐才华

translation.en: with his life.
translation.zh: 付出了性命

translation.en: ♪ I feel like blowing my Old lonesome home ♪
translation.zh: 我好像在燃烧自己的寂寞

translation.en: [John] I was at my father's place one day
translation.zh: 有一天我在我父亲家

translation.en: and he had told me,
translation.zh: 他告诉我：

translation.en: "In 1938, I put on a concert at Carnegie Hall in New York
translation.zh: “1938年 我在纽约卡内基大厅举办了一场演出

translation.en: called 'Spirituals to Swing,'
translation.zh: 叫《从灵魂到摇摆乐》

translation.en: and one of the artists I was trying to find
translation.zh: 其中一个我尝试寻找的艺术家

translation.en: was Robert Johnson to put on the show."
translation.zh: 是罗伯特约翰逊”

translation.en: [Elijah] John Hammond had this idea
translation.zh: 约翰哈蒙德认为

translation.en: that people should understand where jazz came from,
translation.zh: 人们应该明白爵士乐的源起

translation.en: where swing came from,
translation.zh: 摇摆乐的源起

translation.en: and the real roots of the deep country blues.
translation.zh: 以及乡村布鲁斯的真正根源

translation.en: And so he put together this concert
translation.zh: 所以他促成了这个演唱会

translation.en: and he sent a scout to Mississippi looking for Robert Johnson,
translation.zh: 他派了个人去密西西比寻找罗伯特约翰逊

translation.en: and saying, you know, "Please bring him up to play at Carnegie Hall."
translation.zh: 说：“请把他带来卡内基大厅演奏”

translation.en: And the guy went down there and found that Johnson had died.
translation.zh: 那个人去到那 发现约翰逊死了

translation.en: [John] He had died like six months before this show was gonna be.
translation.zh: 他在表演前六个月死的

translation.en: [Bruce] So as the house lights in Carnegie Hall went down...
translation.zh: 所以卡内基大厅的灯暗下来

translation.en: a spotlight was Illuminating a phonograph,
translation.zh: 一束聚光灯照亮一台

translation.en: a Victrola on the center stage.
translation.zh: 在舞台中心的留声机

translation.en: John Hammond came out of the wings.
translation.zh: 约翰哈蒙德从舞台侧边上台

translation.en: [John] My father played a recording of Robert's for the audience.
translation.zh: 我父亲为观众播放了罗伯特的唱片

translation.en: ♪ I's up this morning ♪
translation.zh: 我今早醒来

translation.en: ♪ Blues walkin' like a man ♪
translation.zh: 布鲁斯像人一样行走

translation.en: ♪ I's up this morning ♪
translation.zh: 我在今早醒来

translation.en: [Bruce] The audience went crazy when they heard Robert Johnson.
translation.zh: 当观众们听到罗伯特约翰逊的时候都疯狂了

translation.en: They just thought that he was terrific.
translation.zh: 他们以为他简直棒极了

translation.en: [Bruce] After the Carnegie Hall event,
translation.zh: 在卡内基大厅演出后

translation.en: there was a brief flurry of interest in Robert Johnson,
translation.zh: 人们对罗伯特约翰逊有一段短暂的兴趣

translation.en: but the general public still remained largely unaware of Robert.
translation.zh: 但大部分公众仍然不知道罗伯特

translation.en: His records were not being played on the radio.
translation.zh: 他的唱片没有在电台播放

translation.en: [Zeke] After hearing Robert Johnson's music a few years later,
translation.zh: 几年后在他听了罗伯特约翰逊的音乐后

translation.en: the great blues player, Muddy Waters, went to Chicago
translation.zh: 伟大的布鲁斯演奏家马迪沃特斯去了芝加哥

translation.en: and basically laid the groundwork for what became modern blues.
translation.zh: 可以说他奠定了现代布鲁斯的基础

translation.en: [Keith] Robert Johnson affected my guitar-playing via Muddy Waters.
translation.zh: 罗伯特约翰逊通过马迪沃特斯影响了我的吉他弹奏

translation.en: You can hear the Mississippi mud in there, you know,
translation.zh: 你可以听到密西西比的泥沼

translation.en: and some of Johnson's phrasing.
translation.zh: 还有约翰逊的作词风格

translation.en: ♪ Well now I woke up this morning, baby ♪
translation.zh: 我今早醒来 宝贝

translation.en: ♪ All I had was gone ♪
translation.zh: 我失去了所有

translation.en: [Keith] Elmore James, B.B. King,
translation.zh: 埃尔莫尔詹姆斯 BB金

translation.en: there's a little bit of Johnson in all of them.
translation.zh: 在这些人的音乐中都总有一点约翰逊的影子

translation.en: [Zeke] But the world wasn't listening to Johnson directly.
translation.zh: 但这个世界没有直接听约翰逊的音乐

translation.en: They were listening to other people playing music
translation.zh: 他们听到的是 受到罗伯特约翰逊影响的其他人的演奏

translation.en: influenced by Robert Johnson.
translation.zh: 受到罗伯特约翰逊影响的其他人的演奏

translation.en: [Bruce] It wasn't until the 1950s
translation.zh: 直到20世纪50年代

translation.en: when you have the emergence of what I like to call the "78 Geeks."
translation.zh: 才出现了我称为“78极客”的音乐爱好者

translation.en: These were young, white college students
translation.zh: 那些年轻的白人大学生

translation.en: who would go to thrift shops
translation.zh: 到二手商店

translation.en: and just buy boxes and boxes of 78s.
translation.zh: 一箱一箱地买78转唱片

translation.en: Every once in a while, they'd come across a Charley Patton 78,
translation.zh: 他们会时不时碰上查理巴顿的唱片

translation.en: or they'd come across a Robert Johnson 78,
translation.zh: 会听到罗伯特约翰逊的唱片

translation.en: and this is really how the whole blues craze
translation.zh: 这是整个50年代60年代

translation.en: of the late '50s and early '60s began,
translation.zh: 布鲁斯浪潮的开始

translation.en: by these people hearing this music
translation.zh: 就是因为这些人听到了

translation.en: that was unlike anything that anybody had ever heard before...
translation.zh: 任何人都没听过的独一无二的音乐

translation.en: ...and that's when John Hammond gets the idea that,
translation.zh: 也正是这个时候 约翰哈蒙德想到：

translation.en: "Hey, this would be a great time for me to re-release
translation.zh: “这会是一个我重新发行

translation.en: Robert Johnson's recordings."
translation.zh: 罗伯特约翰逊唱片的好时候”

translation.en: [Zeke] When King of the Delta Blues Singers came out,
translation.zh: （《罗伯特约翰逊三角洲布鲁斯歌王》） 当《三角洲布鲁斯歌王》问世

translation.en: John Hammond would go on to play that music
translation.zh: 约翰哈蒙德向鲍勃迪伦

translation.en: for Bob Dylan when Dylan got signed to Columbia,
translation.zh: 播放了这个音乐当时鲍勃迪伦签了哥伦比亚公司

translation.en: and Dylan says that had he not heard Robert Johnson when he did,
translation.zh: 迪伦说若不是当初听到了罗伯特约翰逊

translation.en: he would not have come up with hundreds of lines for his songs.
translation.zh: 他也不会有灵感写出数百行的歌词

translation.en: ♪ Come on... ♪
translation.zh: 来…

translation.en: [woman] Robert Johnson just took a hold right when those reissues came out
translation.zh: 罗伯特约翰逊的歌曲一经重新发行顿时就吸引了我

translation.en: and then I taught myself to play a bunch of the songs on the record.
translation.zh: 我自学了很多唱片上的歌

translation.en: ♪ Sweet home Chicago ♪
translation.zh: 美丽的家乡芝加哥

translation.en: [Bonnie] If you love the blues,
translation.zh: 如果你爱布鲁斯

translation.en: you gotta just go back to the root and Robert Johnson is
translation.zh: 你就要追根溯源

translation.en: always gonna be one of the greatest that's ever lived.
translation.zh: 罗伯特约翰逊是至今最伟大的音乐家

translation.en: ♪ I got a kind-hearted woman ♪
translation.zh: 我有一个好心的女人

translation.en: ♪ Studies evil all the time ♪
translation.zh: 总是在研究邪恶

translation.en: Robert Johnson motivated me to be a musician.
translation.zh: 罗伯特约翰逊激励我成为音乐人

translation.en: ♪ Ain't but the one thing ♪
translation.zh: 只有一件事

translation.en: ♪ Makes Mr. Johnson drink ♪
translation.zh: 能让约翰逊先生喝酒

translation.en: [Adam] Robert Johnson's album
translation.zh: 约翰逊的唱片

translation.en: had an incredibly powerful effect on Eric Clapton,
translation.zh: 对包括埃里克克莱普顿

translation.en: on Keith Richards,
translation.zh: 基思理查兹在内的

translation.en: on other British blues rock guys at the time.
translation.zh: 英国布鲁斯摇滚人影响十分深远

translation.en: The first blues record that I ever bought was Led Zeppelin II.
translation.zh: 我买的第一张布鲁斯唱片是《齐柏林飞艇二》

translation.en: ♪ I need you to... ♪
translation.zh: 我需要你…

translation.en: They do the line, "Squeeze my lemon 'til the juice runs down my leg."
translation.zh: 他们唱道：“挤压我的柠檬直到汁液顺着我的腿流下”

translation.en: ♪ Squeeze ♪
translation.zh: 挤压

translation.en: ♪ My lemon ♪
translation.zh: 我的柠檬

translation.en: [Zeke] Which is a Robert Johnson line
translation.zh: 是罗伯特约翰逊的歌词

translation.en: and it's a nod and a wink to Johnson.
translation.zh: 是对约翰逊的致敬

translation.en: Brian Jones, the driving force of the first wave of The Rolling Stones,
translation.zh: 布莱恩琼斯即第一波滚石乐队的主要推手

translation.en: was a huge Robert Johnson fan.
translation.zh: 是罗伯特约翰逊的超级粉丝

translation.en: ♪ I followed her ♪
translation.zh: 我跟着她

translation.en: ♪ To the station ♪
translation.zh: 来到车站

translation.en: [Keith] "Love in Vain" is such a beautiful song,
translation.zh: 《徒劳的爱》是很美的一首歌

translation.en: so we thought we're not gonna try and copy Robert Johnson,
translation.zh: 所以我们想着不能复制罗伯特约翰逊

translation.en: especially with a band, you know.
translation.zh: 尤其是不能通过乐队的形式

translation.en: Let's just make it more country, just to bring out the melody more
translation.zh: 让我们把它弄得更乡村一些尝试带出更多旋律

translation.en: than trying to play the blues on it, you know.
translation.zh: 而不是弹出布鲁斯

translation.en: 'Cause a great song can go through any kinds of styles.
translation.zh: 因为好的歌曲可以通过任何形式演绎

translation.en: ♪ It's hard to tell And it's hard to tell ♪
translation.zh: 这很难说 真的很难说

translation.en: ♪ When all your love's in vain ♪
translation.zh: 当你所有的爱都是徒劳的

translation.en: Robert Johnson wakes up the genius in everyone.
translation.zh: 罗伯特约翰逊唤醒了每个人的天资

translation.en: And his music speaks to all of us.
translation.zh: 他的音乐引发了我们所有人的共鸣

translation.en: But with that genius
translation.zh: 但那种天资

translation.en: also comes the devil.
translation.zh: 同样带来了魔鬼

translation.en: Selling your soul to the devil is the basis of the "27 Club."
translation.zh: 出卖灵魂给魔鬼是27俱乐部的基础

translation.en: The 27 Club are musicians
translation.zh: 27俱乐部是指

translation.en: who died at 27 years old.
translation.zh: 27岁去世的音乐人

translation.en: Janis Joplin, Jim Morrison,
translation.zh: 贾尼斯乔普林 吉姆莫里森

translation.en: Amy Winehouse,
translation.zh: 艾米怀恩豪斯

translation.en: Brian Jones, Jimi Hendrix,
translation.zh: 布赖恩琼斯 吉米亨德里克斯

translation.en: Kurt Cobain.
translation.zh: 库尔特科本

translation.en: Other musicians who died at the same age as Robert Johnson
translation.zh: 都是和罗伯特约翰逊一样在同一个年龄去世的人

translation.en: were living recklessly.
translation.zh: 他们过着不计后果的生活

translation.en: Some people feel that all of them had done
translation.zh: 有些人认为他们

translation.en: some sort of supernatural deal to be so gifted,
translation.zh: 都做了某种超自然的交易使自己能够在如此年轻的时候

translation.en: so young, and then be taken so quickly.
translation.zh: 拥有极高的天资 但又英年早逝

translation.en: [Keith] A musician's life is fraught with danger.
translation.zh: 一个音乐家的一生充满了危险

translation.en: It's a pretty dark road at times, you know?
translation.zh: 有时候会误入歧途

translation.en: No wonder some of the best go far too early.
translation.zh: 怪不得一些最优秀的人去世那么早

translation.en: But luckily I got through it. [chuckling]
translation.zh: 很幸运 我撑过来了

translation.en: So far.
translation.zh: 至少现在还活着

translation.en: [Bruce] We have a fascination
translation.zh: 前途无量的人

translation.en: with the person who holds great promise,
translation.zh: 使我们为之深深着迷

translation.en: but that promise seems to be snuffed out prematurely.
translation.zh: 但那无量的前途似乎被过早扼杀了

translation.en: It has to do with us trying to find something fantastic
translation.zh: 这和我们有关因为我们总尝试寻找神奇的事情

translation.en: that makes our life a little bit more interesting,
translation.zh: 让我们的生活变得更有趣一些

translation.en: and possibly, a little bit more dangerous.
translation.zh: 或许更危险一些

translation.en: It allows us to think that we're dancing on the edge.
translation.zh: 这让我们得以想象自己在边缘跳舞

translation.en: [Steven] Myth is so powerful
translation.zh: 传说很有力量

translation.en: because people want to feel like they have the reasoning behind things,
translation.zh: 因为人们想给出事情一种解释

translation.en: to feel like they know.
translation.zh: 让他们自以为知道真相

translation.en: A lot of things are not for us to understand.
translation.zh: 有很多事情不是给我们理解的

translation.en: [Robert] ♪ Me and the devil ♪
translation.zh: 我和魔鬼

translation.en: ♪ Was walkin' side-by-side... ♪
translation.zh: 肩并肩行走

translation.en: [Zeke] I believe Robert Johnson was extremely talented,
translation.zh: 我相信罗伯特约翰逊非常有才华

translation.en: extremely gifted, and way off-balance.
translation.zh: 有天赋 但心理也严重失衡

translation.en: You can hear it in the music.
translation.zh: 你能从音乐听到

translation.en: ♪ ...was walkin' side-by-side... ♪
translation.zh: 肩并肩行走

translation.en: [Zeke] Something's spinning strangely in that man's life,
translation.zh: 在那个男人的生命中某个东西在异常地旋转着

translation.en: and it was with Jimi Hendrix,
translation.zh: 吉米亨德里克斯

translation.en: it was with Kurt Cobain,
translation.zh: 和库尔特科本

translation.en: and the rest of the people in the 27 Club.
translation.zh: 还有其他27俱乐部的人都有类似情况

translation.en: [Steven] I don't know about the 27 Club and the deal with the devil,
translation.zh: 我不知道27俱乐部或是魔鬼的交易

translation.en: but I do know that at some point in everyone's life,
translation.zh: 但我知道在每个人的生命里的某些时刻

translation.en: we come to a crossroads,
translation.zh: 我们会来到十字路口

translation.en: and we all have to choose how much we can sacrifice
translation.zh: 我们都要选择我们要牺牲多少

translation.en: in order to achieve greatness.
translation.zh: 去获得伟大的成就

translation.en: ♪ Down by the highway side ♪
translation.zh: 来到公路旁

translation.en: ♪ So my old evil spirit ♪
translation.zh: 我邪恶的灵魂

translation.en: ♪ Can get a Greyhound bus and ride ♪
translation.zh: 在长途车上旅行
